name: Don't Shoot!
description:
Top-down shooter in which you cannot shoot!

A rocket turret is trying to kill you, and bouncing slime creatures will do the same. To make matters worse, the slime creatures multiply when hit by a rocket. Fortunately you get points when that happens - so that's great!

Controls: WASD or Arrow Keys.

Made for Mark Brown / Game Makers Toolkit Game Jam.
